Context.set("age", Context.get("currentMessage"))

local age = String.onlyNumbers( Context.get("age") )

if tonumber(age) > 21 then 
    Context.set("result", "You are old enough to drink")
else
    local yearsToGo = 21-age
    Context.set("result", "See you in " .. yearsToGo .. " years")
end
Workflow.branch(17)
